locations.name: Bahen
locations.brief_description: You are at Bahen. Elevators to the west, exit to George street to the east.
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.
